content: संप्रयुज् {c7c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To yoke together, harness. {@--2@} To join, connect. {@--3@} To apply, employ, make use of. {@--4@} To perform, execute. {@--5@} To instigate, induce. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To join together, unite. {@--2@} To equip, prepare. {@--3@} To employ, use.
